text:
Many of the IndexOptions require FancyIndexing in order to take effect, however only FoldersFirst actually says so in the documentation.

Determine which of the options require FancyIndexing, and state this in the doc.

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_autoindex.html#indexoptions
creator: rbowen@apache.org
rbowen@apache.org
text:
Looks like it's

SuppressLastModified

SuppressSize

SuppressDescription

SuppressRules

XHTML

IconsAreLinks
